attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tony Blair and George Bush marriage has been disastrous to the people of Britain, Iraq, and Afghanistan.

Rather than focus on domestic affairs such as fixing our Tube, social housing, criminal behaviour (in the UK ,USA) This pair have cavorted over the globe like old fashioned colonialists waging war on all.

Stop the war now and stop wasting our taxed incomes to commit murders.

Sign this petition now and demand that the marriage be nullified!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
